snippet: Her swearing in this week as a member of Myanmar’s Parliament is an important step forward, but the struggle to establish a real democracy is not over.
abstract: Editorial welcomes the swearing in of opposition leader Daw Aung San Suu Kyi to Myanmar's parliament, but warns that the country's struggle to establish a true democracy is far from over; urges the United States and its allies to stand ready to re-impose sanctions should Myanmar's military elite attempt to reassert its stranglehold.
lead_paragraph: Her swearing in this week as a member of Myanmar’s Parliament is an important step forward, but the struggle to establish a real democracy is not over.

headline.seo: Daw Aung San Suu Kyi’s Leap of Faith
headline.main: Daw Aung San Suu Kyi’s Leap of Faith
headline.print_headline: Daw Aung San Suu Kyi’s Leap of Faith
